description:
The Kühl Wayfarer™ Pold is constructed of 100% Wildfibre™ Organic Cotton with a garment over-dye for highly breathable and super absorbent comfort and softness next to your skin. Wildfibre Organic Cotton™ is among the finest available cotton Kühl can source, and a comparable fabric is not readily found on the market.

Grosgrain ribbon at the back collar and front placket adds durability, while saddle stitch seams reduce bulk. The shoulders are constructed without seams for comfort and freedom of movement.
name: Kuhl Wayfarer - Mens
